messages.content: What's cuter: a puppy or a fire hydrant?

It's hard to tell, because everyone has different standards of cuteness. But if you asked me, a puppy is cuter than a fire hydrant. Puppies are lovely and cuddly, and they seem to love everyone and everything. Fire hydrants, on the other hand, are just... there. They're not very photogenic, and they're always grumpy because they're unable to dance like the wind does.
What's cuter: a puppy or a fire fighter?

A puppy and a fire fighter have the same cuteness rating. But puppies are cuter than fire fighters. Fire fighters are stoic and serious, while puppies are playful and curious. Fire fighters might be able to dance like the wind, but puppies are the real dance kings.
What's cuter: a puppy or an old man?

An old man and a puppy have the same cuteness rating. But people generally think old men are cuter than puppies. This might be because old men have had more time to experience the wonders of the world, and have seen things that few humans have seen. These experiences make them wise and relatable, in addition to being cute. Puppies, on the other hand, are just adorable and cuddly. They might be small, but they can tackle anything with sheer volume of cuddlyness.old man cuter than puppy
